original_title: Murderers Among Us: The Simon Wiesenthal Story
overview: A biographical portrayal of Simon Wiesenthal, famous Nazi Hunter. From his imprisonment in a Nazi Concentration Camp, the film follows his liberation and his rise to become one of the leading Nazi hunters in the world, bringing such criminals to justice as Adolf Eichmann and Klaus Barbee.  (Written by Anthony Hughes)
title: Murderers Among Us: The Simon Wiesenthal Story
